  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(CardSide frontSide, CardSide backSide, boolean isFrontFacing, int id, int x, int y, ArrayList<Item> permanentResources, int plantKingdomPoints, int animalKingdomPoints, int fungiKingdomPoints, int insectKingdomPoints, Objective objective, int earnedPoints, String frontImage, String backImage, KingdomResource kingdom)
      Constructor Method with the x and y coordinates
      Parameters:
      frontSide - : Side shown on the front of the Card
      backSide - : Side shown on the back of the Card
      isFrontFacing - : true if the frontSide is shown, false otherwise
      id - : unique identifier for the specific Gold Card
      x - : horizontal coordinate for the Card's position on the table
      y - : vertical coordinate for the Card's position on the table
      permanentResources - : ArrayList of Items containing the Permanent Resource(s) shown on the back side of the Card
      plantKingdomPoints - : Plant Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      animalKingdomPoints - : Animal Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      fungiKingdomPoints - : Fungi Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      insectKingdomPoints - : Insect Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      objective - : the Condition used to calculate how many points the player earns.
      earnedPoints - : points the card gives once it's placed (0 if it doesn't give points)
      frontImage - : a String containing the Description of the Objective, displayed in the GUI.
      backImage - : a String containing the Description of the Objective, displayed in the GUI.
      kingdom - : the kingdom the card belongs to

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(CardSide frontSide, CardSide backSide, boolean isFrontFacing, int id, ArrayList<Item> permanentResources, int plantKingdomPoints, int animalKingdomPoints, int fungiKingdomPoints, int insectKingdomPoints, Objective objective, int earnedPoints, String frontImage, String backImage, KingdomResource kingdom)
      Constructor Method with the x and y coordinates
      Parameters:
      frontSide - : Side shown on the front of the Card
      backSide - : Side shown on the back of the Card
      isFrontFacing - : true if the frontSide is shown, false otherwise
      id - : unique identifier for the specific Gold Card
      permanentResources - : ArrayList of Items containing the Permanent Resource(s) shown on the back side of the Card
      plantKingdomPoints - : Plant Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      animalKingdomPoints - : Animal Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      fungiKingdomPoints - : Fungi Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      insectKingdomPoints - : Insect Type points necessary to place the Card on the table (0 if not necessary)
      objective - : the Condition used to calculate how many points the player earns.
      earnedPoints - : points the card gives once it's placed (0 if it doesn't give points)
      frontImage - : a String containing the Description of the Objective, displayed in the GUI.
      backImage - : a String containing the Description of the Objective, displayed in the GUI.
      kingdom - : the kingdom the card belongs to

      public Objective getObjective()
